Last night, I went to a party called "The Intel Geek Party" and it was a blast.
I expected a bunch of nerds playing with their computer all night,...
...but instead, I came across incredibly creative people.
Hence, this "dream booth" invented by Armella Leung,...
...who calls herself a "multi medium graphic designer."
It's made of a pillow on which dreams are displayed by a video projector.
And of course, since the pillow has also built-in sensors,...
...you can actually interact with your dreams.
